name: Intertwined (Precotonejde)
description:
Intertwined is about a game where you have to repair the relationship of two people living apart by guiding a ball of twine from one house to the next, so that they can communicate better, and fix their relationship as the thread of twine connects the two tin cans within their respective houses.

Move the ball around by tilting the island using the left joystick of a controller. Press the Joystick(L3) for selection. It's highly recommended to use a gamepad, but it's also possible to move using WASD and select with the Enter or Space button.

Created by: Jann Andre Fjelde Mjoen, Davide Beercock, Cameryn Tuliao, Samuel Chaba for Global Game Jam 2020 at Abertay University, Scotland
